alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 6:04AM EST until December 22 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Heavy mixed precipitation expected in parts of central Piscataquis County. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches. Sleet accumulations of around one half of an inch and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch expected, mainly across central Piscataquis County. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook and Northern and Central Piscatquis Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook
